titleStmt.title: The names of 51 persons chosen the 10th of September 1695. at Drapers-Hall in Throgmorton-street, for a committee to consider of proper methods for settling and establishing a National Land Bank
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, John, fl. 1695.

titleStmt.title: The names of 51 persons chosen the 10th of September 1695. at Drapers-Hall in Throgmorton-street, for a committee to consider of proper methods for settling and establishing a National Land Bank
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, John, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: A list of names, each followed by the number of votes received.
At foot: The abovesaid committee are desired to meet at Drapers-Hall, on Monday the 16th instant September, at two of the clock in the afternoon precisely.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
